attributes.additional_details: Our town is being modernised beyond recognition, we would like to preserve 1 of the old buildings which is set for demolition.We request that the building currently known as the Sol Viva night club in Bury lancashire be a grade 2 listed building.

rejection.details:
To have a building considered for listing you should submit an application to English Heritage. The application form that you will need to fill out, and further information about the listing process, can be found at the following link: http://www.english-heritage.org.uk/professional/protection/process/online-application-form/

If you do not have access to the internet you should contact English Heritage for a paper version. The English Heritage customer service team can be contacted on 0870 333 1181.
